Text.Page:
, eliminate the wild boars rampaging around the farmlands to the south of the Embattled Outpost, and bring back the wild boar's tusks.

Concentrate on the {@LinkCreature:17#300050#wary gutspiller warthogs} and {@LinkCreature:17#104#forked tusk warthogs}.
Thanks to you, <PCNAME>, the farmland is starting to look like the way it used to be.
Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:17#300050#wary gutspiller warthogs} and {@LinkCreature:17#104#forked tusk warthogs} and bring me their tusks.
